short_summary: 150 pairs of custom reusable decibel blocking ear protectors
description: Department of National Defence (DND) requires up to 150 pairs of custom reusable decibel blocking ear protectors.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 
#### Contract Title
Custom Ear Protection (W0103-249557_B)

#### Government Solicitation
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to participate in a contract to supply Custom Ear Protection to the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Tender Notice Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Custom Ear Protection |
| Reference Number | WS4279690676-Doc4500500641 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4279690676 |
| Publication Date | March 21, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | April 18, 2024, 2 PM ET |
| Amendment Date | March 28, 2024 |
| Contract Term | Effective Date - Not Specified, Expiration Date: March 31, 2027 |
{#tab-detail2}
| UNSPSC Category | UNSPSC Category Description |
| --- | --- |
| 46181900 | Hearing protectors (English) / Protecteurs d'oreille (French) |
| Procurement Category | Goods (GD) |

#### Technical Specifications
The Government of Canada invites you to propose a solution for supplying Custom Ear Protection that meets the requirements of the Department of National Defence. Up to 150 pairs of custom reusable decibel blocking ear protectors are needed.

#### Service Standard
Competitive bidding

#### Evaluation Criteria
 Variations or combinations of the above methods


#### Contract Information

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/ Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) |
| Contracting Entity Address | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5 |
| End User Entity Name | Department of National Defence (DND)/ Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN) |
| Contact Information | Anthony, Mitch, (SPAC/PSPC) <mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca> |

#### Additional Information

You can obtain full details of the solicitation via Supply Canada's electronic tendering service. For technical assistance, contact [information contact email] if you have questions about the solicitation or require further clarification.
